ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Weapon Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Why the Partisan over the Saber - Saber 11/23 = .478 Partisan 9/19 = .474 Is it the speed of 19 over the 23?  I thought ratio was more important than speed?
ygData.messageBody:
Why the Partisan over the Saber -
Saber 11/23 = .478
Partisan 9/19 = .474

Is it the speed of 19 over the 23? I thought ratio was more important than
speed?

Also - what is Copelands?

Thanks buddy

Slyde


-----Original Message-----
From: Blitz Krieg [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 6:28 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon Advice


If you're committed to using the Mace and Saber combo, I'd put the Mace in
primary. Normally you want the fastest weapon in the main hand to take
advantage of the primary hand damage bonus, but in this case I believe the
better ratio of the mace will make it superior to the saber. If I were you,
tho, I'd use the Partisan in main and the Mace in offhand... I believe
that'll give you a higher damage output overall (19 Delay fast weapon in
primary and great ratio weapon in secondary). Reserve the Saber for
situations where you don't want aggro.

You may want to verify my recommendations on Copelands just to be sure,
hehe.

There is a proc message, but for the life of me I can't remember what it is
atm.

Darkfox

I have the following:
Guardians Mace 1HB 14/24 Proc: Guard (24 or so Cleric AC Buff)
Symphonic Saber 1HS 11/23 CHA+10 Int+5 Symphonic Harmony

Which should go in the primary and which in secondary? The Mace has a
better Ratio - but I thought someone posted faster weap should be in
primary. Also - the mace procs CONSTANTLY.

Anyone know if there's a message for the proc on the Saber? I just got it
and haven't been able to tell.

Lastly - I was previously using the Guardians in primary and a Sioniches
Partisan (Piercing 9/19 Cha+6 Int+2 Sv Magic+5) in my offhand - and don't
see any reason to hang on to it. Any Xegony guys know what's worth and
anyone who may want to buy it?

Slyde Katzenjammer
56 Bard Xegony
Officer, Dragons of Kel`Dar
